meta.title: TOH Climate News Briefing
meta.description: Daily AI-analyzed climate news briefing platform

toh.heroSubtitle: We connect people for climate action, bridging generations to build a sustainable future for all.
toh.value1Desc: It's our responsibility to care for the foundation of our lives.
toh.value2Desc: It serves as a bridge connecting the present and future generations.
toh.value3Desc: It's not an obligation, but a way of living.

dashboard.preindustrial: Global average temperature rise compared to pre-industrial levels.
dashboard.warmingStripesDesc: 50 years of temperature change. The redder the stripe, the hotter.
dashboard.seaLevelDesc: Annual sea level change since satellite observations
dashboard.arcticDesc: Every September, Arctic sea ice reaches its annual minimum. Since 1979, Arctic sea ice extent has declined dramatically.
dashboard.septMinExtent: September Minimum Sea Ice Extent Trend
dashboard.ctaDesc: Gemini AI analyzes and summarizes climate news from around the world.
dashboard.dataSource: Data Sources: Berkeley Earth, NOAA, NSIDC

briefing.noBriefingDesc: No briefing has been generated yet. Run the backend pipeline to have AI analyze today's climate news and generate a briefing.
briefing.noData: No briefing data available. Please run the pipeline.
briefing.loadError: An error occurred while loading the briefing.
briefing.noDateBriefing: No briefing data for this date.
briefing.newsAnalyzed: news articles analyzed by AI and delivered in spokesperson format.
briefing.dataSource: Data Sources: Berkeley Earth, NOAA, NSIDC

archive.emptyDesc: No briefings have been saved yet. Briefings will be automatically saved daily when the backend pipeline runs.
archive.loadError: An error occurred while loading the archive.
archive.title: Briefing
archive.desc: View daily climate news briefings organized by date.
archive.dataSource: Data Sources: Berkeley Earth, NOAA, NSIDC
archive.noDateData: No briefing data for this date.
archive.thisDateBriefing: Climate news briefing collected on this day.
archive.noDataForDate: No briefing data for this date.
